p: No significant difference in relative organ weight (left kidney, lung, heart, spleen) was observed in treated groups compared to controls. However, there was a significant difference in mean relative organ weight of right kidney treated with highest dose of EO (400 mg/kg) compared to control group (mean difference 0.1896, 95 % CI: 0.04638, 0.3329, P = 0.0093). Significant variations in relative organ weight of spleen, left and right kidney was also observed between male and female groups ( Table 2).
